result.markdown:
# Causal Inference in Statistics: Pearl, Glymour, Jewell

Outline how to solve the @Primer exercises in R.





## Study question 1.3.2


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
ed <- tibble(Gender = c("M","M","M","M","F","F","F","F"),
             eLevel = c("U","H","C","G","U","H","C","G"),
             num    = c(112,231,595,242,136,189,763,172)) %>%
  mutate(total = sum(num))

ed %>%
  kable()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
|Gender |eLevel | num| total|
|:------|:------|---:|-----:|
|M      |U      | 112|  2440|
|M      |H      | 231|  2440|
|M      |C      | 595|  2440|
|M      |G      | 242|  2440|
|F      |U      | 136|  2440|
|F      |H      | 189|  2440|
|F      |C      | 763|  2440|
|F      |G      | 172|  2440|
:::
:::


## Answers

$$
P(eLevel = H)
$$


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ed %>%
  filter(eLevel == "H") %>%
  mutate(p_H = n()/total) %>%
  kable()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
|Gender |eLevel | num| total|       p_H|
|:------|:------|---:|-----:|---------:|
|M      |H      | 231|  2440| 0.0008197|
|F      |H      | 189|  2440| 0.0008197|
:::
:::


$$
P(eLevel = H\ \vee \ Gender = F)
$$


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ed %>%
  filter(Gender == "F" | eLevel == "H") %>%
  mutate(p_HorF = sum(num)/total) %>%
  kable()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
|Gender |eLevel | num| total|    p_HorF|
|:------|:------|---:|-----:|---------:|
|M      |H      | 231|  2440| 0.6110656|
|F      |U      | 136|  2440| 0.6110656|
|F      |H      | 189|  2440| 0.6110656|
|F      |C      | 763|  2440| 0.6110656|
|F      |G      | 172|  2440| 0.6110656|
:::
:::


$$
P(eLevel = H\ |\ Gender = F)
$$


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ed %>%
  filter(Gender == "F") %>%
  mutate(tcond = sum(num)) %>% 
  filter(eLevel == "H") %>%
  mutate(p_HgivenF = sum(num)/tcond) %>%
  kable()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
|Gender |eLevel | num| total| tcond| p_HgivenF|
|:------|:------|---:|-----:|-----:|---------:|
|F      |H      | 189|  2440|  1260|      0.15|
:::
:::


$$
P(Gender = F\ | \ eLevel = H)
$$


::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
ed %>%
  filter(eLevel == "H") %>%
  mutate(tcond = sum(num)) %>% 
  filter(Gender == "F") %>%
  mutate(p_FgivenH = sum(num)/tcond) %>%
  kable()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
|Gender |eLevel | num| total| tcond| p_FgivenH|
|:------|:------|---:|-----:|-----:|---------:|
|F      |H      | 189|  2440|   420|      0.45|
:::
:::
